Indonesian: idgeng, idpreman from Dutch nlvrijman (idgangster from English

idroda gigi influenced by Dutch nltandwiel, 
gearbox,zsmkotak gear,idpersneling from Dutch nlversnelling
idstik golf, idpemukul golf, idtongkat golf

Malaysian: zsmkerajaan derived from zsmraja (king) – used in Malaysia and Brunei – in Indonesian means "kingdom"
Indonesian: idpemerintah derived from idperintah (order/instruction) – also used in Singapore, which, like Indonesia, is a republic

Malaysian: zsmgabenor, zsmYang di-Pertua Negeri (in Malaysian states)

Indonesian: idkelompok, idgrup from Dutch pronunciation of nlgroep, id(per)kumpulan, id(per)himpunan
idjaminan, idgaransi from Dutch pronunciation of nlgarantie
